description: Passthrough Arguments - Pass CLI arguments directly to underlying AI tools without validation

userStories.title: Remove validation for passthrough arguments
userStories.description: As a user, I want to pass any CLI arguments to the underlying tool without validation errors.
acceptanceCriteria: Remove validateArguments() call for args passed to tools
Args like /slop, --model=gpt-4, -v pass through unchanged
Special characters like slashes and dashes don't cause rejection
Keep validateToolCommand() for the tool command itself
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Implicit passthrough for direct tool invocation
userStories.description: As a user, I want 'ai o /slop' to launch opencode with /slop without needing -- separator.
acceptanceCriteria: 'ai claude /slop' launches 'claude /slop'
'ai o --help' launches 'opencode --help'
'ai amp -p prompt' launches 'amp -p prompt'
Multiple args work: 'ai claude --model sonnet --help'
Typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Verified: implicit passthrough works for all test cases. Args pass through without -- separator.

userStories.title: Passthrough after fuzzy selection with separator
userStories.description: As a user, I want to select a tool via fuzzy search and pass args using 'ai -- /slop'.
acceptanceCriteria: 'ai -- /slop' opens fuzzy selector, then passes /slop to selected tool
'ai -- --help' opens fuzzy selector, then passes --help to selected tool
Multiple args after -- all pass through
Existing -- separator behavior preserved
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Optional args prompt after interactive selection
userStories.description: As a user, I want to optionally provide arguments after selecting a tool interactively.
acceptanceCriteria: After fuzzy selection of non-template tool, prompt: 'Arguments (optional, press Enter to skip):'
Empty input launches tool without args
Entered args pass directly to the tool
Templates with $@ continue using existing prompt behavior
Non-template tools without $@ get the new optional args prompt
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Update help text with passthrough examples
userStories.description: As a user, I want the help text to show how to use passthrough arguments.
acceptanceCriteria: EXAMPLES section includes: 'ai claude /slop' - Pass /slop to claude
EXAMPLES section includes: 'ai o --help' - Show opencode's help
Examples clearly demonstrate passthrough usage
Typecheck passes
